name: Make a Big Game: The Game
name_original: Make a Big Game: The Game
description:
This is a game representation of the struggles and obstacles that indie game developers face when building a large game. Especially new game developers who have big ideas but  little resources to or know how to make ambitious games. Its a humorous twist as to what a sole game developer might go through when creating a game that  should really be done by a large team of people.

Controls

W : Forward

S : Backward

Space: Jump
